data.title: Hulk Hogan declares 'total surrender and dedication to Jesus' during Florida baptism
data.meta_description: Wrestling icon Hulk Hogan declared "total surrender and dedication to Jesus" when he was recently baptized at a church in Florida.
data.text:
Wrestling icon Hulk Hogan declared "total surrender and dedication to Jesus" when he was recently baptized at a church in Florida.

The former WWE star and his wife, Sky Daily Hogan, held the ceremony at Indian Rocks Baptist Church and reflected on the experience in a .

"Total surrender and dedication to Jesus is the greatest day of my life. No worries, no hate, no judgement...only love," he wrote.

The post included a video of them dunking their heads into the water.

shared Hogan's post in an Instagram story saying "God is doing amazing things at Indian Rocks," according to

It isn't the first time Hogan has spoken about accepting Jesus into his life.

In April, he that he accepted Christ as his savior at 14 years old and "the training, prayers and vitamins" kept him in the game.
